name: .UGG
summary: Learn about .UGG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can play UGG files with the Rode Central desktop app (Windows and macOS) and the Rode Central Mobile app (Android and iOS). However, you must first connect the Wireless Go II device to the Rode Central app to transfer the audio recordings.

You can convert UGG files to .WAV and .MP3 audio files with the Rode Central app. If you cannot access the Rode Central app, you can use the "Rode_WirelessGoII_UGG2wav" .PY script (with Python and the wave library installed).
